results.title: Metformin alleviates muscle wasting post-thermal injury by increasing Pax7-positive muscle progenitor cells

results.title: PGC-1alpha-Targeted Therapeutic Approaches to Enhance Muscle Recovery in Aging
results.journal: Int J Environ Res Public Health
results.text_hl: In this review, we present several therapeutics that target @GENE_PPARGC1A @GENE_10891 @@@PGC-1alpha@@@ in skeletal @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ such as @CHEMICAL_Leucine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007930 @@@leucine@@@, beta-hydroxy-beta-methylbuyrate (@CHEMICAL_beta_hydroxyisovaleric_acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:C004961 @@@HMB@@@), @CHEMICAL_Arginine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001120 @@@arginine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Resveratrol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077185 @@@resveratrol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and combination therapies that may have future application to conditions of @DISEASE_Muscular_Disorders_Atrophic @DISEASE_MESH:D020966 @@@disuse@@@ and recovery in @SPECIES_9606 @@@humans@@@.

citations.NLM: Petrocelli JJ, Drummond MJ. PGC-1alpha-Targeted Therapeutic Approaches to Enhance Muscle Recovery in Aging Int J Environ Res Public Health. 2020 Nov 21;17(22):. PMID: 33233350

results.title: [Metformin reduces the signs of sarcopenia in old OXYS rats].
results.text_hl: We analyzed the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ on muscular strength of the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ and on structural and functional parameters of skeletal @<m>DISEASE_Muscle_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019042 @@@muscle@@@ by means of light microscopy.
